Hispanic and Latino communities are shaping the future through innovation, creativity, and a deep, interconnected cultural legacy. From the arts, to science, to technology, these communities aren’t just part of the American story; they are helping define it. Their influence reaches every corner of society, shaping the future of culture, the workforce, and innovation in the U.S. and beyond.​

At Xbox, we’re spotlighting games made by Hispanic and Latino creators & storytellers who are building imaginative worlds shaped by their cultures and experiences. These creators, game developers, artists and entrepreneurs embody the very innovation and drive that are shaping the future of tech and entertainment.​

**“Somos el Futuro”** (We Are the Future), is a call to action. It’s about recognizing the leadership and innovation already coming from Hispanic and Latino communities and investing in what comes next. Whether through games, art, storytelling, or technology, these communities are not waiting for a seat at the table. They are building their own.​

Join us in celebrating Hispanic Heritage Month. Let’s elevate stories that inspire, break barriers, and shape a future where gaming is for everyone. ​

**Somos el Futuro. Let’s build it together.**

# **Play**

## **Explore Games Curated by Hispanic and Latino Communities at Microsoft**

Hispanic and Latino voices bring a rich and vibrant history to life through authentic storytelling and inspired creativity.​​ Video games elevate these stories for an immersive experience. To celebrate these communities, explore a variety of game collections spanning creators, playable characters, and titles influenced by Hispanic and Latino cultures around the world.

Available on the Microsoft Store on Xbox and Windows, check out [**the Latin American community games collection**](https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/browse/latin-american-communities) that exists year-round as part of our ongoing work to create more gaming ecosystems for everyone and elevate content that resonates with communities.

# **Give**

## **Gaming** **with Impact**

Rewards members in the United States can earn and donate points to organizations supporting Hispanic and Latino communities with Xbox. The organizations below will be available on the Rewards hub:

- [**Hispanic Heritage Foundation**](https://hispanicheritage.org/)****– Hispanic Heritage Foundation’s mission focuses on education, workforce, identity, and social impact through the lenses of leadership and culture.

- [**CARE**](https://www.care.org/)****– CARE works around the globe to save lives, defeat poverty, and achieve social justice in 100 countries including Latin America and the Caribbean.

Xbox players 18 and older can earn Rewards points in various ways, such as playing games, completing Game Pass Quests (terms apply), and purchasing games and other eligible items at the Microsoft Store (exclusions apply). [**Start earning for impact today**](https://www.xbox.com/en-US/Rewards) and redeem your points for great rewards. Donate your points on the Rewards hub or on the [**Rewards redeem page**](https://rewards.bing.com/redeem/donate).
